item.title: A pothole in road problem, 1st May
item.description:
Cavity developing in the road. Does not look to be a sinkhole, but the tarmac is starting to deteriorate. Customer is worried for young riders hitting it. Customer reports that they have driven over it before they were aware it was there, nd it was a significant enough drop for them to feel like through the suspension.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Historic sign post in conservation area., 1st May
item.description:
The historic sign is still missing and red barrier fence in place. Case cannot be closed until sign post is returned/replaced.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 1st May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed best out of hours please replace x1 missing rocking kerb stone 300x150x30mm stats required number 1 please note due to shape the original kerb stone is still intact and will be back at bamfurlong depot for reinstatement (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet
